pageTitle: SmartWool® NTS Mid 250 Cuffed Beanie | High-Performance Merino Wool
textBeforeTable: HATS Sizing Dry Clean. Professionally dry clean as necessary. Iron Low. Hot irons can scorch the fabric. Dry Flat. Lie the garment on a towel and let air dry. Do Not Bleach. Bleach damages the natural wool fiber. Machine Wash Cold Gentle Cycle. Care Style SW0SW956 Knit in Vietnam of 100% Merino Wool Clean finish seams for bulk-free fit Roll cuff earband for adjustability and added warmth Double layer knit construction NTS Mid 250 fabric Features Learn More > We design our products to live up to your greatest adventures. And we stand behind everything we make, 100%.
